meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed phenylbutazone for my knee pain.
meanings.sent2: She took phenylbutazone to relieve her headache.
meanings.sent3: The bottle of phenylbutazone danced on the shelf, ready to ease discomfort.
meanings.sent4: Like a superhero, phenylbutazone swooped in to fight the inflammation villain.
meanings.sent5: The relief from phenylbutazone was like a cool breeze on a hot day.

meanings.sent5: The caregiver skillfully phenylbutazoned the treatment to the elderly woman.
